personalInfo.name: Sophia Tan
personalInfo.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in Next.js and cloud-native applications. Passionate about building performant, scalable, and user-centric solutions that bridge the gap between frontend and backend systems.

experience.description:
• Built internal dashboards and SaaS platforms using Next.js and TypeScript.
• Designed and deployed serverless APIs on AWS Lambda with DynamoDB.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments on Vercel.
• Enhanced performance by implementing caching strategies with Redis.

• Developed UI components in React with reusable design patterns.
• Assisted in migrating legacy codebase into modern Next.js stack.
• Improved accessibility (WCAG 2.1 compliance) across company projects.

projects.name: FoodieHub
projects.description: A restaurant discovery and food ordering web app with SSR for SEO optimization and integrated payment systems.
projects.technologies: Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, Stripe API

projects.name: EduLearn
projects.description: An e-learning platform with video streaming, quizzes, and real-time chat between instructors and students.

personalInfo.name: Arjun Mehta
personalInfo.summary: Full-Stack Developer specializing in Next.js,React,and Node.js with a strong background in building scalable applications and seamless user experiences. Skilled in modern web technologies,performance optimization,and API design.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

experience.description: • Developed and deployed full-stack applications using Next.js,React,and Node.js.• Built scalable APIs with Express and integrated MongoDB for data persistence.• Optimized server-side rendering (SSR) performance for SEO and load times.• Implemented authentication and role-based authorization with NextAuth.js.• Collaborated with designers to deliver responsive and accessible UIs.

• Assisted in building responsive React components for a SaaS dashboard.• Integrated REST APIs and improved page load performance by 20%.• Worked closely with QA team to resolve UI/UX bugs and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

projects.name: E-Shop Pro
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with Next.js,featuring product search,user authentication,Stripe payments,and admin dashboards.

projects.name: TeamSync
projects.description: A real-time collaboration tool with chat,task management,and notifications,designed for distributed teams.

projects.name: Devfolio
projects.description: A customizable developer portfolio template supporting SSR,dark mode,and CMS integration.

personalInfo.name: Mateo Rodriguez
personalInfo.summary: Software Engineer focused on full-stack development with Next.js, React, and Node.js. Skilled at designing REST/GraphQL APIs, implementing SSR/SSG, and delivering high-performance, SEO-optimized applications.

experience.description:
• Designed and built web applications with Next.js and React.
• Developed APIs with Express and integrated PostgreSQL for scalable data handling.
• Improved SEO rankings through SSR and SSG techniques in Next.js.
• Built reusable UI component library with Tailwind CSS.
• Mentored junior developers on modern frontend and backend practices.

• Assisted in building admin dashboards with React.
• Worked on API integrations and frontend optimizations.
• Contributed to code reviews and testing workflows.

projects.name: TravelMate
projects.description: A travel planning and booking platform with SSR-enabled search, integrated payment gateway, and personalized recommendations.
projects.technologies: Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Tailwind CSS, Stripe

projects.name: HealthTrack
projects.description: A fitness tracking web app with real-time activity logging, personalized dashboards, and progress analytics.
